description: Luke Desmond and his candles want to play a game. Mike is stretched out on the floor so he can't struggle as Luke pours wax all over his captive's chest and underwear. Luke wants to know how long Mike can hold his dick hard in the air, and with the threat of more wax poured straight onto his dick and balls. Mike struggles and strains to keep his dick stood on end, but it wasn't long enough to keep his captor satisfied.
title: Luke Desmond & Mike Stafford
